sentences: Poiss oli juba kuueaastasena suur kirjatarkuse uurija.
Eesti ajaloo uurijad. See teema paelub mitme ainevalla uurijaid.
context: Uurija is an Estonian word that can refer to a researcher or investigator in various fields. It comes from the verb 'uurima' (to research/investigate). The term can be used for both academic researchers (like historians, linguists, etc.) and law enforcement investigators. Examples include ajaloo uurija (history researcher), kohtueelset uurimist teostav ametnik (pre-trial investigation officer), and various specialized researchers like seene uurija (mushroom researcher) or kosmose uurija (space researcher).
